mapper.select: select to_char(sysdate - 3, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as firstDay, to_char(sysdate - 2, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as secondDay, to_char(sysdate - 1, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as thridDay, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as fourthDay, count(decode (v_date, to_date(#{today}, 'YYYY/MM/DD')-3,1 )) as firstCount, count(decode (v_date, to_date(#{today}, 'YYYY/MM/DD')-2,1 )) as secondCount, count(decode (v_date, to_date(#{today}, 'YYYY/MM/DD')-1,1 )) as thridCount, count(decode (v_date, to_date(#{today}, 'YYYY/MM/DD'),1 )) as fourthCount from visit

select count(decode (signup_date, to_date(#{today}, 'YYYY/MM/DD')-3,1 )) as firstCount, count(decode (signup_date, to_date(#{today}, 'YYYY/MM/DD')-2,1 )) as secondCount, count(decode (signup_date, to_date(#{today}, 'YYYY/MM/DD')-1,1 )) as thridCount, count(decode (signup_date, to_date(#{today}, 'YYYY/MM/DD'),1 )) as fourthCount from sign_up
